attributes.action: change the rules so that all housewives who, like Mrs Speaker, choose to use a taxi to go shopping may charge the expense to their annual tax bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is morally wrong that one housewife who does NOT contribute to the tax take of the country is entitled to use, with impunity, those taxes contributed by everybody else to pay for shopping trips by taxi while taxpaying housewives are deprived of that facility.  The government needs to, at least make the playing field level.  Where high profile spongers like Mr and Mrs Speaker can use the taxes we pay into the fund (against threat of criminalisation) then we should be able to set the same expenses allowance to be set against our annual income tax bill.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
